http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kosmos-tks-spacecraft/

Hornet (Hover Bike).craft (25 KB)

HX-1 Starfighter.craft (79 KB)

1. fasten your seatbelt

2. aktivate the antigravity device for hover mode by pressing alt+F12

3. go into docking mode and push the starfighter with the rcs trusters up

4. activate engines turn on SAS and go!

5. after reaching a speed of more than 150m/s you can turn of the anti-gravity device (Hover bike requires the gravity hack)

6. enjoy

you schould activate the infinite fuel option. because its a spacefighter and it can go to infinity ... and beyond!

nothing realistic but a fun to fly spacefighter for your daily fight against the evil.

never trottle to maximum.

regards
